distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-16839: Fixed a buffer overflow in the SASL authentication code (bsc#1112758).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Curl versions 7.33.0 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a buffer overrun in the SASL authentication code that may lead to denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
